issue.title: [R] CRAN installation dependency on libthrift-0.16.0.so
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17967](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17967). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
My apologies if this is already being adressed.

**Issue:** Latest version of arrow on CRAN depends on libthrift-0.16.0.so. However, thrift on the Arch community repo has been updated to version 0.17.0-1, replacing with libthrift-0.17.0.so.

{**}Solution{**}: Downgrading thrift to 0.16.0-1 through pacman solves the issue.
